brief_summary.textblock:
The objective of this study is to evaluate the efficacy, safety, pharmacodynamic,
      pharmacokinetic and immunogenic profiles of SA237 in patients with NMO and NMOSD

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study as Add-on Therapy of SA237 to Treat NMO and NMOSD

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          1. NMO or NMOSD

          2. Age 12 to 74 years, inclusive at the time of informed consent.

        Exclusion Criteria

          1. Pregnancy or lactation.

          2. Evidence of other demyelinating disease or progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy
             (PML).

          3. Known active infection (excluding fungal infections of nail beds or caries dentium)
             within 4 weeks prior to baseline.

clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Randomized, Addition to Baseline Treatment, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Phase 3 Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of SA237 in Patients With Neuromyelitis Optica (NMO) and NMO Spectrum Disorder (NMOSD)

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.time_frame: up to approximately 30 months from first patient in
